summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Training Hero fitness tracker app with RPG elements. Backend APIs working well (93.8% success rate), frontend loading and navigation functional, but found some UI interaction issues with form elements.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 status code

ui_bugs.issue: Exercise dropdown selection not working properly in weightlifting session
Weight input field not retaining filled values (shows 0 instead of 80)

integration_issues.issue: Workout completion may not redirect properly to dashboard

design_issues.issue: CSS compilation error was present initially (rpg-card class usage)

passed_tests: Weightlifting and cardio workout creation via API
Frontend login page loading and form submission
Dashboard page loading and user info display
Navigation between all pages (achievements, quests, profile, history)
Tempo tracker component visibility and basic interaction
Cardio session page loading and activity selection
User stats display (level, XP, strength, endurance, agility)
RPG theme and styling working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix exercise dropdown selection in weightlifting session - the Select component is not properly handling option selection. Also investigate weight input field value retention issue. These are preventing complete workout flow testing.
